newsitem.title: LEBANON: Bank of Lebanon issues CDs worth 24 bln pounds.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Lebanon issues CDs worth 24 bln pounds.

text.p: The Bank of Lebanon said on Thursday it issued certificates of deposit dated August 15 to commercial banks worth 24 billion Lebanese pounds.
The central bank sold 60-day certificates worth 14 billion pounds at 12.25 percent interest. It sold 45-day CDS worth 10 billion pounds at 11.50 interest.
Last week, the bank sold 60-day certificates worth 40 billion pounds at 12.25 percent interest and 45-day CDs worth five billion pounds at 11.5 percent interest.
